hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name given to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Which release to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CI_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of the ci-scripts repository to use

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CI_REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the ci-scripts repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SETUP_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: List of args to pass to setup.sh

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_GROUP_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify a build group id after launching a Devbuild, it will be used for report.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PREBUILD_CMD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Command to be run before build commonly used to modify local.conf

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PREBUILD_CMD_FOR_TEST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Command to be run before build commonly used to modify local.conf

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_CMD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The full build command

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_CMD_FOR_TEST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The full build command for test

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The docker image to run the build inside

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REGISTRY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Docker registry to pull images from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POSTPROCESS_IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The docker image to run the build post process steps

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POSTPROCESS_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of form KEY=VAL which will be injected into post process script environment

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POST_SUCCESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of scripts from scripts dir to run after successful build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POST_FAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of scripts from scripts dir to run after failed build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NETWORK
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The switch for network access

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TOASTER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The switch for using Toaster for build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REMOTE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify a remote for wrlinux_update.sh script to clone or update from

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DEVBUILD_ARGS
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Yaml structure with layers used to setup devbuilds

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: LOCALCONF
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Contents of a local.conf file that will override the default local.conf

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LAYERINDEX_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the type of layer index

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LAYERINDEX_SOURCE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the source URL of layer index

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BITBAKE_REPO_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the URL of bitbake repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Perform runtime tests if the build succeeds, it's suite name or disable

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_CONFIGS_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Test configuration file for build and runtime tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RUNTIME_TEST_CMD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The command to do runtime test

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Docker image used to run tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POST_TEST_IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Docker image used to post test processing scripts

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of env vars passed to test and post test scripts

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POST_TEST_SUCCESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of scripts from scripts dir to run after successful tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POST_TEST_FAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of scripts from scripts dir to run after failed tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_CREDENTIAL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Using credentials stored in Jenkins to access git server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of Git Credentials stored in Jenkins

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MACHINE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Override default machine

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SDKMACHINE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Override default sdk machine

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISTRO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Override default distro
